---
category: news
title: "How it Works: Machine Learning Against Email Phishing"
excerpt: "Phishing remains one of the most fraudulent tricks that can be found in malicious email traffic. In this type of attack, a recipient will receive an email, for example, disguised as a message from a well-known company that requires them to follow a link and login to a service or enter bank card details on a fake web page."
